variable.name: proteinsDirectory
variable.description: Directory of input proteins to load

variable.name: resultsDirectory
variable.description: Directory where to store the outputs

variable.name: timesFeatureGeneration
variable.description: Number of generate output files for one protein. So one file generated every maxNumberIterations/timesFeatureGeneration.

variable.name: maxNumberIterations
variable.description: Max number of desired iterations for the optimization

variable.name: commandLineMoverParameters
variable.description: Parameters for the mover specified, see the mover description for more information. (submission example : -movp 2.3,1.0,4.5)

variable.name: commandLineOptimizerParameters
variable.description: Parameters for the optimizer specified, see the optimizer description for more information. Parameters must be given in the same order as for the constructor.
